name: Fruit Salad
overview: Welcome to the world of Fruit Salad, a platform game from Grand Master Design. The idea of the game is to collect all of the gems from each level and get to the exit but since evil Triax has turn all of your friends into mutant fruit and vegetables, try to avoid them or die in the process by touching them. The game has 20 levels and the enhanced version has over 60. Every five levels you will be given a level code, you can use these as the main menu screen, and this will start you at the last level code received. If you collect the letters "GAME UP", then you will be able to play the Surf Game! This will enable you to collect extra lives. You can also collect bonuses on screen. They are "F"reeze, "B"onus, "T"urbo and "S"hield.
